mapper.sql: CUST, SKYTERMSM, SKYTERMSD, TAXH, CNAME, DESNAME, DESNAMEGENP, DESNAMESKYU, CALEN, YLEAD, DELNAIJIKIKAN, OVERTAKE, HASUUGAKU, HASUUTAX, BUNRC, BUSHO, HITO, TEL, FAX, SIME, LASTSIMEDATE, KAMOKU, CURRE, ZIP, ADR1, ADR2, MAIL, NOTE, SYSNOTE, CUSTKU, LINKCUST, INPUTDATE, INPUTUSER
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BASIC_XCUST(CUST, SKYTERMSM, SKYTERMSD, TAXH, CNAME, DESNAME, DESNAMEGENP, DESNAMESKYU, CALEN, YLEAD, DELNAIJIKIKAN, OVERTAKE, HASUUGAKU, HASUUTAX, BUNRC, BUSHO, HITO, TEL, FAX, SIME, LASTSIMEDATE, KAMOKU, CURRE, ZIP, ADR1, ADR2, MAIL, NOTE, SYSNOTE, CUSTKU, LINKCUST, INPUTDATE, INPUTUSER) VALUES
( #{item.cust}, #{item.skytermsm}, #{item.skytermsd}, #{item.taxh}, #{item.cname}, #{item.desname}, #{item.desnamegenp}, #{item.desnameskyu}, #{item.calen}, #{item.ylead}, #{item.delnaijikikan}, #{item.overtake}, #{item.hasuugaku}, #{item.hasuutax}, #{item.bunrc}, #{item.busho}, #{item.hito}, #{item.tel}, #{item.fax}, #{item.sime}, #{item.lastsimedate}, #{item.kamoku}, #{item.curre}, #{item.zip}, #{item.adr1}, #{item.adr2}, #{item.mail}, #{item.note}, #{item.sysnote}, #{item.custku}, #{item.linkcust}, #{item.inputdate}, #{item.inputuser} )
mapper.update: update BASIC_XCUST set CUST = #{cust}, SKYTERMSM = #{skytermsm}, SKYTERMSD = #{skytermsd}, TAXH = #{taxh}, CNAME = #{cname}, DESNAME = #{desname}, DESNAMEGENP = #{desnamegenp}, DESNAMESKYU = #{desnameskyu}, CALEN = #{calen}, YLEAD = #{ylead}, DELNAIJIKIKAN = #{delnaijikikan}, OVERTAKE = #{overtake}, HASUUGAKU = #{hasuugaku}, HASUUTAX = #{hasuutax}, BUNRC = #{bunrc}, BUSHO = #{busho}, HITO = #{hito}, TEL = #{tel}, FAX = #{fax}, SIME = #{sime}, LASTSIMEDATE = #{lastsimedate}, KAMOKU = #{kamoku}, CURRE = #{curre}, ZIP = #{zip}, ADR1 = #{adr1}, ADR2 = #{adr2}, MAIL = #{mail}, NOTE = #{note}, SYSNOTE = #{sysnote}, CUSTKU = #{custku}, LINKCUST = #{linkcust}, INPUTDATE = #{inputdate}, INPUTUSER = #{inputuser} WHERE CUST = #{cust} and
